module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: The Skrill fee structure is a competitive 1.2%+0.29 and 1%+0.29 for Instant bank transfer. * Fees apply to new merchants only. From 1st March 2021. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep your store up-to-date: benefit from the latest features and improvements available.Protect your store: stay up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Optimize your SEO: enhance your search results on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: The all-in-one tool : synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial

module.name: blockwishlist
module.description: Allow customers to create wishlists to save their favorite products for later
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allow customers to create wishlists to save their favorite products for later.
module.additional_description: Decrease cart abandonment: wishlists are saved directly in the customer's account. Whenever they are ready, customers can easily find their favorite products and add them to their cart. Increase your visibility: Customers can share a link of their wishlists. The more they do, the more visibility your store will gain!

module.name: productcomments
module.description: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: increase your conversion rate with a comments section, helpful to reassure and show your visitors your store is trustworthy.Improve your SEO: search engines will use it to discover new content.Rich snippets: enrich your search engine results by displaying rating stars on your store - it allows you to gain visibility, and therefore increase your traffic.

module.name: dashactivity
module.description: Check in one glance what is happening on your store with a list of KPI on your dashboard
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check in one glance what is happening on your store with a list of KPI on your dashboard.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Handle your stock: keep an eye on your out-of-stock products and be ahead of your needs.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work:- Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: smartsupp
module.displayName: Smartsupp – live chat, chatbots, video recordings
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp combines live chat, chatbots, and video recordings into an affordable package that saves you time and resources in order to help you turn your visitors into loyal customers.
module.additional_description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp helps businesses deliver a personalized online shopping experience and drives sales by combining live chat, chatbots and video recordings, allowing you to genuinely connect with your customers to better identify their needs.  As one of the most popular ecommerce solutions in the world with over 50,000 active webshops and websites, Smartsupp offers:A one-and-only combination of live chat, chatbots, and video recordings–automate responses to repetitive questions, deliver personal service when needed and see how and where you can improve your conversion rate.  Access to real-time visitor lists enriched with e-commerce data–see who is browsing your webshop, which products they are interested in and proactively start a conversation to assist you in making a sale. A FREE Mobile App–be more accessible to your customers with Smartsupp’s app for iOS and Android phones so that you can reply to visitor inquiries even when you are in the warehouse or on the go.  What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like shopping your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Picture the category tree: it is very useful to navigate between category and subcategory pages.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Stay available: your customers will love to know when and how they can join you, it is always useful!Establish a trust relationship: the contact section of your store is helpful to reassure and show your visitors that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Connect with your customers: create an easy purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Build your brand image: adding text to your pages allows you to focus your customers on specific aspects of your brand.Address specific customers: you can create content for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Strengthen your content strategy: provide information and target keywords to reach best search engine results.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter

module.description_full: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your visibility: select what category you want to focus attention on and display a few of its items on your front office.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way.

module.name: ps_emailalerts
module.description: Make your everyday life easier, handle mail alerts about stock and orders, addressed to you as well as your customers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your everyday life easier, handle mail alerts about stock and orders, addressed to you as well as your customers.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you recall stock and orders to your visitors, it will stimulate their shopping.Handle your stock: keep an eye on the products that can soon be out-of-stock.

module.name: ps_bestsellers
module.description: Show your visitors what are your top-selling products directly on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Show your visitors what are your top-selling products directly on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Create a showcase: display your store’s best selling items directly on your front office and boost your sales.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of your most purchased products.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_cashondelivery
module.description: Accept cash payments on delivery to make it easy for customers to purchase on your store
module.author: PrestaShop

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Facilitate shopping: create a flexible purchasing environment for your clients, allow to make them feel like going back.Allow anyone to buy your products: accepting cash on delivery help customers without a credit card to purchase your items.

module.name: ps_brandlist
module.description: Display your brands on your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display your brands on your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display in one-click all the brands available and optimize the user experience.Increase your visibility: highlight the brands you sell on your shop and focus on your SEO to gain traffic.

module.name: ps_newproducts
module.description: Highlight your store's newest products, display a block on the homepage and let the visitors know about your latest news
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Highlight your store's newest products, display a block on the homepage and let the visitors know about your latest news.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business is always on the alert with new products entering your catalog regularly, let your customers know about it to stimulate their shopping.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of the last products available in your catalog.Stimulate your traffic: displaying new products on your homepage shows your visitors your store is very active, then it will make them come back check at it!

module.name: ps_specials
module.description: Provide information on your special offers in a specific block displayed on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Provide information on your special offers in a specific block displayed on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Catch your customers’ attention: you can let them know, at one glance, about all the best deals offered on your store.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of the special offers currently available.Clean your stock: easily promote the products you want to stop in order to clear your stock and focus on your new items.

module.name: ps_supplierlist

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display your suppliers on your catalog and allow visitors to filter their search by supplier.

module.name: ps_viewedproduct
module.description: Display a kind of showcase on your product pages with recently viewed products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display a kind of showcase on your product pages with recently viewed products.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you recall to your visitors what items they last viewed, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display recently viewed products via this immediate, one-click access and optimize the user experience.

module.name: ps_crossselling
module.description: Offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: because your products need special attention, display related products via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Reassure your customers, display a short notice to let them know you care about privacy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Reassure your customers, display a short notice to let them know you care about privacy.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by displaying a small block in the customer account creation form.Reinforce trust: tell your customers what you do (and don’t) with their private data - you can trust us, it will be much appreciated!Boost your sales: a client who feels confident will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.Address specific customers: you can create specific contents depending on the language.

module.author: PrestaShop

You can use your new email template immediately.Manage your email content: content and translations automatically retrieved for traditional transaction emails (more than 30 templates).Access your emails in one-click: store default email templates in PrestaShop and purchased templates.

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses.  Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses.  Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go. Increase your revenue potential by adding the Mailchimp module for free.
module.additional_description: Increase your revenue potentialWhen you connect your Prestashop store to Mailchimp, you unlock features that can help you increase revenue and drive conversion. Mailchimp’s all-in-one marketing platform makes it easy to build and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns that drive sales. Increase traffic to your site and drive repeat purchasesMailchimp tools not only help you increase traffic to your site but with the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) features you can start building stronger relationships with your customers with content that means something to them. Understand what works so you can amplify your effortsWith a connected store, you bring your ecommerce and marketing data into one centralized place. This allows you the ability to understand the ROI of your marketing efforts so you can best optimize your marketing strategy.

module.name: ps_googleanalytics
module.description: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Analyze your visitors' behavior: be able to retrace all the stops your customers take on the road to action on your store.Gain new customers: read this data as a measurable way to improve your campaigns and reach new audiences.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads Clever - Google Ads & Google Shopping
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right customers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: cedwish
module.description: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform.
module.additional_description: The Wish module will empower you to become a global seller with ease—just create a single product listing to reach customers in more than 100 countries.  Wish is the most downloaded app globally for three of the past four years, Wish provides merchants with easy access to more than 100 million monthly active users across the globe (source: Sensor Tower). Unlike most marketplaces more than 70% of sales on Wish do not originate from search queries. Wish’s unique algorithm helps find the users that are most likely to buy your products—and we place your products front and center for them.

module.name: ps_themecusto
module.description: Easily build your homepage: access the main front office modules and quickly configure them
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Easily build your homepage: access the main front office modules and quickly configure them.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop with a well-built homepage.Build your brand image: creating a nice homepage allows you to make your customers focus on the parts of your activity you want to highlight.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to the main modules.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.name: ps_mbo
module.displayName: PrestaShop Marketplace in your Back Office

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio - Translate your PrestaShop in over 50 languages
module.description: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling worldwide with a few clicks right away
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling worldwide with a few clicks right away.
module.additional_description: Facilitates international salesTranslate your store automatically Glotio is much more than a simple automatic translator tool, is specialized in PrestaShop and it automatically translates many parts of your online store with no need to import/export texts.Multiply your sales, translating your e-commerce shop in more than 50 languages ​​and selling in many countries!  How does it work:Download and install our free module. In the PrestaShop marketplace you can find our certified module. Download it for FREE and create your account in just two minutes.We analyze your store for translatable content. Our simple wizard will guide you in a few steps through the process necessary for Glotio to track your PrestaShop for translatable material.Indicate which languages you want to translate your PrestaShop in. Once we know what content is available to carry out the translation, you can tell us which languages you want us to do it in. The first translation to the 1st language is FREE! Glotio updates your translations whenever you want. The languages that you have translated in our panel will be updated automatically or manually at the time you want, so that you always have your online store updated. KEY TOOLSFind and replace: You can always find some word or string of words that you prefer to replace by another. With this tool it will now be a piece of cake. Excluded words: You will most likely want to not translate certain words, such as brands or suppliers. You can automatically add them to the exclusion list. Smart Dictionary: No one knows the products you sell as much as you or your team, so you can teach Glotio how to translate certain words. What does that product provide you?• Boost your SEO: Glotio respects all the SEO of your default language, in this way you can start the organical positioning in any country you decided to sell using their native language.• International Marketing: Exportable data feed in all languages ​​to start marketing campaigns in new countries and multiply your visits. The translations are saved in your PrestaShop, so you can create a data feed in the different languages.• Increase the conversion ratio because you sell in the language of your customers.• Translate your entire online store (catalog, products, categories, attributes, characteristics, manufacturers, suppliers, attachments, etc.) into more than 50 languages ​​in record time.• Suitable for everyone. No programming knowledge or expert PrestaShop or HTML / CSS required.• You save time. Translate your online store quickly.• You pay only what you translate, with no monthly fees.

module.name: ps_metrics
module.description: Drive your ecommerce performance and improve your business efficiency using a data-driven approach with PrestaShop Metrics
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Drive your ecommerce performance and improve your business efficiency using a data-driven approach with PrestaShop Metrics. Get a complete view of your business in real time and execute actionable optimization plans from your back-office. Whether you are a new merchant or an ecommerce expert, this data management module is made for you!
module.additional_description: Take control of your ecommerce statisticsAn intuitive and easy to use dashboard that saves time, no more switching between different applicationsSynchronization with Google Analytics: Easily install of a Google Analytics Tag and synchronize with your account to retrieve reliable traffic data. Compatible with Google Analytics v4.Cross-reference sales, orders, shopping carts and traffic data from the most reliable sources such as Google Analytics or your PrestaShop online store in a single interfaceCompare, analyze and visualize the evolution of your performance with unlimited access to historical data. Save time with a revamped interfaceYour key figures grouped in a way that makes it easier to read and to analyze themTraffic detailed by acquisition channelUnderstandable, usable, and relevant dataBenefit from the customizable reporting tools such as CSV export or email reporting. Turn insights into actionsMake informed decisions, create action plans and improve results through data integration. SecurityYour data is protected and access is secured from your PrestaShop back office.Enjoy a dedicated server to store your data: maintain the speed and performance of your website for optimal efficiency.

module.name: ps_accounts
module.description: Prestashop Account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Prestashop Account

module.name: klaviyops
module.description: Klaviyo, a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more, gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions—so you can build long-term customer relationships at scal
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klaviyo, a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more, gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions—so you can build long-term customer relationships at scale, and grow your business on your own terms.
module.additional_description: Automations to help you make money while you sleep.Dozens of built-in automations are fully customizable, like welcome emails, happy birthday, or abandon cart. Each can have any mix of emails and texts. So while you’re dreaming up your next big idea, customers are automatically getting timely, actionable info. Smarter targeting. Deeper personalization. Bigger payoff.Drive more sales with powerful personalization. Whether you’re sending a drip campaign, a transactional email, or a special holiday campaign, ultra-relevant content can help you boost engagement—and earn more revenue. Get more answers out of your data.Data is powerful—but only if you can find it, understand it, and act on it. With Klaviyo, performance is clear. Pre-built reports answer the marketing questions that matter most. Go beyond vanity metrics and understand what’s driving sales. (Really.) Sync all your store data with a single clickOur seamless one-click ecommerce integration allows you to sync all your historical and real-time data, so you can stay on top of every single interaction people have with your brand. Grow your contact list with engaging web forms.Select from expertly designed form templates, and create engaging website forms that turn site visitors into subscribers with our simple Form Builder.

module.name: ps_facebook
module.description: PrestaShop Facebook allows you to easily feature your products on Facebook and Instagram so people can discover and buy them
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PrestaShop Facebook allows you to easily feature your products on Facebook and Instagram so people can discover and buy them. Create Ads Campaigns from PrestaShop, increase traffic and optimize the performance of your campaigns by managing your data.
module.additional_description: Synchronize your product catalog with Facebook and centralize all your accountsImport your product catalog details to Facebook in a few clicks, your updates will be automatically synchronized.Manage all your Facebook accounts from a single interface. You can easily create your Facebook shop if you dont have one yet. Create, manage and optimize your advertising campaignsAttract new customers by automatically creating ads from your catalog, design your ad, set the targeting and placement without leaving PrestaShop.With Facebook's similar audiences and data collected by the Conversion API, refine your target and reach more qualified prospects.Use data from the Facebook pixel to understand how your customers navigate through your store, and measure results from your ads. Optimize the customer experience by integrating MessengerOrders can be placed on all types of devices, directly from your ads and the customer journey is optimized.Remove the last barriers to conversion by integrating Messenger into your store: you can live chat with your customers, set up automated replies or build a custom experience. Control the sharing of your dataThe Conversions API allows you to control what data you share and when you share it, as well as offer your customers more transparency by respecting their confidentiality requests. This feature enables businesses to share data directly from the server with Facebook, instead of relying on web browsers.

module.name: tiktokforbusiness

module.additional_description: Grow your business with TikTok, one of the world’s leading social media & entertainment platforms with over 1BN MAU. With the official TikTok integration you can: Easily create or connect your existing TikTok For Business and Ad Manager accounts to your Prestashop store.Automatically sync your product catalog to TikTok in a matter of minutes.Showcase your products and drive sales with access to TikTok’s organic opportunities such as TikTok Shopping and Product Links.Drive new shoppers to your Prestashop store with one of TikTok’s various creative ad formats, including Collection Ads and Dynamic Showcase Ads.Maximize your return on ad spend (ROAS) through detailed campaign performance tracking via multi-session attribution, enabled by the most advanced TikTok Pixel

module.name: tidiolivechat
module.displayName: Chatbots, Live Chat and Messenger by Tidio
module.description: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email.Trusted by 300,000+ businesses
module.additional_description: Provide the best possible customer service and increase your sales. Tidio is a multichannel customer support tool for instant communication with your website visitors and customers. With live chat and chatbots, you can answer their questions in an instant and solve problems faster. Using Tidio will improve your customer’s experience, increase their loyalty and as a result, increase your conversion rate. And yes - it is available for free. What makes Tidio so effective in generating sales? As many as 75% of online customers said they expect help within five minutes. Integrate your live chat, email inbox, Messenger, and Instagram into one multichannel communicator and answer your customers in an instant!Ready-to-use chatbot templates for answering repetitive questions and performing simple tasks. What’s more—we have used machine learning to make your bot understand your customer’s intentions.Actionable statistics that show how effective and useful for your customer are your chatbotsLive visitors’ list that shows who is visiting your website in real-time and allows you to monitor which part of your website they are browsing What differentiates Tidio? Simplicity—it takes only 5 minutes to install the chat widget and start conversations with your customers300.000 businesses generated 20M leads and $500M additional revenueUnique chatbot builder - 100% codeless.Built-in chatbot templates empowered with AICustomizable, beautifully designed widgetIntegrations with email, Messenger, InstagramA free mobile app for iOS and AndroidExcellent customer support available for you 24/5 Sample tactics you can implement in 5 minutes to boost your sales: Stop 60% of customers from abandoning their carts by offering a discount or free shippingWelcome every website visitor and encourage them to make purchases by giving personalized discounts o informing them about special offersSend a personalized message to those who want to leave your websiteWelcome returning visitors and customers with a personalized messageMonitor visitor activity and recommend best-selling productsRun upselling bot to increase the average order value Numbers behind Tidio The 4th most popular live chat solution with over 300.000+ active users20M leads generated and $500M additional revenue with TidioThousands of positive reviews 20+ built-in, ready to use chatbots24/5 support to solve your problems and help you improve your business with Tidio

module.name: ritmoinsights

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Growth analytics platform for e-commerce entrepreneurs.RITMO Insights helps e-commerce entrepreneurs make business decisions by analyzing their financial, revenue, marketing, and cash flow metrics.
module.additional_description: Save TimeConnect all your technical and business stack in less than 5 minutes and enjoy the pleasure of having all your KPIs in one place. AnalyzeFocus on data analysis and say goodbye to spending hours building complex visualizations. AutomateForget about extracting data and updating spreadsheets by hand. We take care of everything. Save moneySave yourself the cost of third-party tools to extract the metrics that really matter to your business.

module.name: psxmarketingwithgoogle
module.description: PrestaShop Marketing makes it easy to connect your store with Google and promote your products to millions of shoppers across different networks like Google Search, YouTube or Gmail
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PrestaShop Marketing makes it easy to connect your store with Google and promote your products to millions of shoppers across different networks like Google Search, YouTube or Gmail. Create Performance Max campaigns without leaving your PrestaShop dashboard and drive more traffic.
module.additional_description: Just starting out in Google advertising?Get 500* USD of Google Ads credits** when you spend at least 500 USD to create your first campaigns. Install PrestaShop Marketing with Google and create your new Google Ads account. Your voucher will be applied automatically from the moment you start spending!**Credit equivalents in other local currencies: €400 / £400 **Credit available for all new Google Ads accounts. The amount needs to be spent within 60 days of the first campaign spend and credits will be valid for 60 days once credited. Credit amounts vary by country and region according to the Terms & Conditions. Sync your product catalog with GoogleConnect your store to Google Merchant Center to sync your products dailyKeep product details such as price and availability automatically updatedEnable free listings for your productsBroaden your reach by showing your products to shoppers browsing on the Shopping tab, for freeFree listings allow to show your product attributes, including image and price in organically-ranked listings on the Shopping tabCreate and manage Performance MaxPromote your products across different networks, like Google Search, YouTube, Discover, Maps or GmailGet started with Performance Max using PrestaShop, set a daily budget and let Google’s smart technology optimize your campaigns
